detail_desc: Printed cotton jersey T-shirt.

Airy blouse in a gently crinkled weave with overlocked edges. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with flounces at the cuffs. Double layer of fabric front and back with flounces at the hem.

Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. 3/4-length, elasticated sleeves, buttons down the front and a seam with a drawstring at the waist.

Jersey sports jacket with a brushed thermal inside, lined hood and long raglan sleeves with taped details. Zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs.
